title: Tahm main: help me support better
body:
I think I am currently silver 3. It changes between silver 3, 1, and even bronze.

I wonder if I am building incorrectly. Can any of you offer build suggestions or any tips in general would be appreciated. Right now in silver 3 I have faith in my AD carries mostly so I am happy to support and peel for them, they can deliver the damage. So I tend to mostly go for utility right now.

Thank you!
